חולות סרטן שד בשלב 0 לא יצטרכו למהר לניתוח https://www.sciencenews.org/article/stage-0-breast-cancer-wait-surgeryTina Hesman Saey Fri, 20 Dec 2024 14:00:00 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147597 Women with Stage 0 breast cancer who got biannual mammograms and delayed surgery for two years fared as well as those who got immediate surgery. 3147597
הישגים מדעיים אלה קבעו שיאים חדשים בשנת 2024 https://www.sciencenews.org/article/science-records-2024Andrea Tamayo Thu, 19 Dec 2024 18:00:00 +0000Life https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147283 Noteworthy findings include jumbo black hole jets, an ultrapetite frog, ancient asteroid remnants and more. 3147283
מסתכלים אחורה על השנה במדע ומה הלאה https://www.sciencenews.org/article/looking-back-year-in-science-what-nextNancy Shute Thu, 19 Dec 2024 17:42:53 +0000Uncategorized https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147100 Each year we dedicate the final issue of Science News to reviewing the big stories in science, technology and medicine. And each year, I marvel at the many significant news events and research discoveries crammed into a year. Most significant: The growing tyranny of heat. For the second year in a row, our planet experienced […] 3147100
מקרי המוות הקשורים לקור גדלו מאז 1999 בארה"ב https://www.sciencenews.org/article/cold-temperature-death-rate-hypothermiaAimee Cunningham Thu, 19 Dec 2024 16:35:13 +0000Health & Medicine https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147789 From 1999 to 2022, the rate of cold-related deaths rose from about 4 per 1 million people to 9 per 1 million in the United States. 3147789
בינה מלאכותית מרחיחה את תווי טעם הוויסקי כמו גם את המקצוענים https://www.sciencenews.org/article/ai-sniffs-whiskey-flavor-like-prosCarolyn Gramling Thu, 19 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000Artificial Intelligence https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147714 A machine learning algorithm identified the top five flavor notes in 16 types of whiskey. Each matched the aggregate of what a panel of human pros said. 3147714
מיקרו-חרוז חדש מתגלה כיעיל כמצחצח עור ללא פלסטיק https://www.sciencenews.org/article/new-microbead-plastic-free-skin-scrubSkyler Ware Thu, 19 Dec 2024 14:00:00 +0000Chemistry https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147553 The nonplastic polymer cleaned up eyeliner and permanent marker and broke down into molecules related to sugar and amino acids. 3147553
איך ייראה חקר החלל תחת טראמפ? https://www.sciencenews.org/article/space-exploration-nasa-trumpLisa Grossman Wed, 18 Dec 2024 20:00:00 +0000Space https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147662 A lot is unknown, but the roles of billionaires like Elon Musk and Jared Isaacman suggests a focus on human and private spaceflight. 3147662

סקוטש הוא המפתח ליצירת סרטים דקים של יהלום https://www.sciencenews.org/article/scotch-tape-create-diamond-filmEmily Conover Wed, 18 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000Materials Science https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147688 The sticky stuff helped peel sheets of diamond less than a micrometer thick off silicon wafers, creating membranes useful for electronic devices. 3147688
אלו הם סיפורי החיות האהובים עלינו משנת 2024 https://www.sciencenews.org/article/favorite-animal-stories-2024Darren Incorvaia Wed, 18 Dec 2024 14:00:00 +0000Life https://www.sciencenews.org/?p=3147065 Pigeons that do somersaults, snakes that fake death with extra flair and surprised canines are among the organisms that enthralled the Science News staff. 3147065
